name: Happy Haven LLC
specialty: Residential Treatment Facility  Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Happy Haven LLC is a Residential Treatment Facility  Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Auburn, ME. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $65.3M in Medicaid payments across 10K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $65.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
